sentence.text: To dissect the genetic architecture of sporadic ALS, we undertook a large sequencing study in 755 apparently sporadic ALS cases and 959 controls, analyzing 10 ALS genes: SOD1, negative regulation of protein phosphorylation, TARDBP, FUS, angiogenesis, CHMP2B, ATXN2, NIPA1, SMN1, and UNC13A.
